means: 寡妇所得遗产（丈夫生前划定的）

sentence.Network_en: She has only her jointure, which will descend to her children.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只有她的寡妇所得产, 而那会留给他的孩子们的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... jointly 共同地 jointure 寡妇遗产 joist 托梁.
... joinder 结合,连接 jointure 寡妇所得财产 conjoint 结合的,联合的.
...须有与亡妻生前共生的子女。这种遗产主要是指的土地。寡妇所得产(jointure)，指丈夫生前拨给妻子的产业，通常指出租的房地产， …
jointtuberculosis 关节结核的, jointure 使妻子继承遗产, jointtuberculosis 骨关节结核

list.abs: ...sation in vitro et transfère embryonaire 体外受精和胚胎移植jointure acromioclaviculaire 肩锁关节junction utétéropelvique 肾盂输尿管交界处.
Pièces de la centrale à béton Attache en croix 十字铨(搅拌机配件扣件) Attache de jointure 对接扣件 Attache de refoulement 回转扣件 Attache de U.
海军军用术语词汇J-1... ... 联合[作战地]区 joint zone 联合指挥部；联合指挥权 jointure of command 舱面副值更官 JOOD.
早期系结 French, 翻译, 发音, 字典 Chinese... ... 结石 lithiase;calcul 内部联结 jointure interne 匿名系结 liaison anonyme.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'junction, joint'): from Old French, from Latin junctura (see juncture). In late Middle English the term denoted the joint holding of property by a husband and wife for life, whence the current sense

means.word_mean: 1. (law) an estate secured to a prospective wife as a marriage settlement in lieu of a dower
2. the act of making or becoming a single unit;

sentences.sentence: "he looked forward to the unification of his family for the holidays"
